backend/main.mo: Main canister defining clients, interventions, user profiles, access control, and storage mixins with CRUD methods and authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty technicalFolder map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, fetch interception, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry configuring router, authentication state, layout, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Empty placeholder file for the admin unlock dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/blacklist/Blackl: UI panel to mark or unmark a client as blacklisted, including comments and media upload handling.
frontend/src/components/clients/CreateCl: Modal dialog for creating a new client with basic contact and address fields.
frontend/src/components/clients/EditClie: Modal dialog for editing an existing client's info, prefilled from the client object.
Wrapper around Badge providing extra visual variants like success, warning, and pending.
frontend/src/components/guards/Authentic: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users and shows a loader during initialization.
frontend/src/components/interventions/Ad: Dialog for creating a new intervention with date fields, comments, and media attachments.
frontend/src/components/interventions/Ed: Dialog for editing an intervention, preloading date, comments, and media for modification.
frontend/src/components/interventions/In: Dialog showing intervention date, author, comments, media, and optional edit action.
Lists interventions with author info, media preview, edit/delete actions, and detail view dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileLay: Mobile layout with header showing user info, logout button, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/FilePicker: Button-triggered hidden file input for selecting files with optional filters and multiple selection.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPicke: Lets users choose media from camera or gallery, including live camera preview and photo capture.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPrevi: Displays a grid of image previews from ExternalBlob URLs.
frontend/src/components/sync/Connectivit: Shows online/offline status and sync controls with pending count indicator.
frontend/src/components/technical-folder: Displays a technical file row with type icon, metadata, preview, and delete action.
Dialog for uploading a technical file with name input, picker, progress, and submit handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlacklist.ts: Provides mutations to mark or unmark clients as blacklisted, supporting offline queueing and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useClients.ts: Implements queries and mutations for fetching, searching, and saving client records with offline support.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile, role, and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines identity context and provider handling login, logout, and persistent identity via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInterventions.ts: Provides CRUD-like hooks for client interventions with sorting, offline mode, and permission checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Manages syncing of offline operations, auto-triggering sync when online and pending actions exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useTechnicalFolder.ts: Handles listing, uploading, and deleting technical files through backend actor interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and utility layers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: IndexedDB wrapper creating outbox and cache stores and providing CRUD helpers for offline operations and cached data.
frontend/src/offline/outbox.ts: Adds offline operations to the outbox store via a simple enqueue wrapper.
frontend/src/offline/syncEngine.ts: Fetches queued offline operations, runs them against the backend actor, and removes successful or unauthorized ones.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDossierPage.tsx: Client dossier UI showing client info, interventions, and blacklist status with edit and add dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Client list page with search, technical folder shortcut, and create-client dialog handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity and redirecting authenticated users to the clients list.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalFolderPage.t: Technical file management page enabling listing, uploading, and deleting stored technical files.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs registration results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings. Defines content paths, custom radii, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's state, including existing features, new feature requests, and metadata for implementing a technical folder for file storage. Used to track requirements and development progress.
